pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Large Carnivore $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() Semi $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Aggressive $(br)$(l)Type:$() Solo Hunter $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Grasslands

Journal Page by $(l)HannahPBnJ$() $(br2)The Tarbosaurus is a large-sized, swift carnivore. It is semi-tamable as a baby by feeding it meat. You cannot ride or tell Tarbosaurus to follow you, but it will attack mobs for you.
